Here is a little secret that I saw on a blog. I won't say what it is here for fear of retribution by the mods, but I will give the link to the blog.

Here it is: http://kerbal.blogspot.com/2012/08/infinite-fuel-cheat-spoilers-ahead.html

Praying my account won't get shut down...
Yeah, this has been well known for about a month now. You're safe.
Yeah, the debug console is pretty nifty. I use it sometimes to put a descent stage in orbit so I don't have to build the rest to test it. I doubt you'll be banned for mentioning it.
Pretty sure the dev hacks wouldn't get your thread shut down but idk...

Don't you worry, it was probably left in intentionally (or was it?), but of course, one should only use those cheats to test rocket designs, not to actually fly full missions (where's the fun, otherwise?)
Don't get too used to it! This is the sort of debug utility that gets left out of the final version!
softweir, I'd say this is the kind of this that gets transmuted into cheat codes in final versions of single player games So it will probably still be available.
Yeah, well, cfg editing is basically the same as cheating too

Don't get too used to it! This is the sort of debug utility that gets left out of the final version!

Meh, there'll probably be a mod to replace them anyway
I guess it kind of is a cheat code, with shift, ctrl, alt and D.
